channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Minister says government not mistreating Palestine Action activists on hunger strike
item.description: Commons leader denies allegation and says government ‘not trying to break bodies’ after doctor said prisoners were dying The government is “not trying...

item.title: Australia news live: NSW treasurer says ‘globalise the intifada’ is hate speech; Islamic State ‘proud’ of Bondi terror attack
item.description: Daniel Mookhey’s comment comes as governments consider new laws cracking down on hate speech. Follow today’s news live. Get our breaking news email , ...

item.title: Farage avoids police investigation over alleged electoral law breach
item.description: Essex force says report is outside time limit for prosecution, while Electoral Commission says it has not found any undeclared spending Nigel Farage h...

item.title: ICE meets snow as midwesterners fight back against Trump immigration raids
item.description: Videos show people in Minnesota and Illinois throwing snowballs at federal agents trying to arrest residents ICE, meet snow. As federal agents aggress...

item.title: Trump signs order reclassifying marijuana as less dangerous
item.description: Change will loosen limits on research and certain regulations but stops short of making marijuana legal Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive o...

item.title: UK names Christian Turner as ambassador to US, replacing Peter Mandelson
item.description: Turner has spent a nearly 30-year career working across Whitehall and the Foreign Office.

item.title: Remembering the sports stars we lost in 2025
item.description: A host of figures from the world of sport died in 2025 - BBC Sport remembers some of those sporting names.

item.title: Kennedy Center to be renamed Trump-Kennedy Center, White House says
item.description: The board of the performing arts centre, which was appointed by Trump, voted to rename it to honour him, the White House press secretary says.

item.title: Democrats release latest batch of Epstein photos as justice department deadline looms
item.description: The materials include photos of women's passports, and Lolita quotes written across a woman's body.

item.title: HR exec in viral Coldplay clip speaks of abuse, threats and trying to find a new job
item.description: The former tech executive says she was bombarded with abusive and threatening messages after being filmed with her boss on the 'kiss-cam'.
